statements: SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions;
SELECT player_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_type FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT player_id, transaction_date FROM in_game_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, player_id, transaction_amount FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM in_game_transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM in_game_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM in_game_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchases FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, player_id FROM virtual_currency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_transaction_amount FROM virtual_currency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM in_game_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 100;
SELECT player_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM virtual_currency_transactions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM in_game_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 50 AND purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) AS total_players FROM virtual_currency_transactions;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT user_id, item_name, item_price FROM purchases WHERE item_price > 100;
SELECT user_id, total_spent FROM users WHERE total_spent < 500;
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT user_id, total_spent, virtual_currency_balance FROM users ORDER BY total_spent DESC, virtual_currency_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_id = '123abc';
SELECT user_id, item_name, item_price FROM purchases WHERE item_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, purchase_date, item_name, item_price FROM purchases JOIN users ON purchases.user_id = users.user_id WHERE total_spjsont > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM in_game_players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM in_game_players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM items_catalog ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT player_name, coins_balance FROM in_game_players WHERE coins_balance < 1000;
SELECT player_id, item_id, purchase_date FROM purchases_history ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level, coins_balance FROM in_game_players;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_description, item_price FROM items_catalog WHERE item_price > 100;
SELECT purchase_id, player_id, item_id, purchase_date, quantity, total_price FROM purchases_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(coins_amount) as total_coins FROM transactions_log GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_coins > 1000;
SELECT * FROM in_game_players JOIN transactions_log ON in_game_players.player_id = transactions_log.player_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM items WHERE item_price > 100;
SELECT user_id, username, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance < 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT exchange_id, from_currency, to_currency, exchange_rate FROM currency_exchange WHERE exchange_rate > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, item_name, item_price FROM purchases WHERE item_price > 100 ORDER BY item_price ASC;
SELECT username, account_balance FROM users WHERE account_balance > 5000 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
